name: Lost Reflections
description:
A nomad travels alone in the forest, only to be trapped by a strange spirit. The spirit entraps her within the mirror world, and she must make her way out. She notices her reflection amongst mirrors scattered around this surrealist forest, and she pulls herself together, becoming stronger, to search for a way out.

A game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1. All art, audio, and code assets were made in a week for this jam.

Credits:

LAN Laboratories

Luis (https://whatifzeldawasagirl.itch.io/) - Audio

Avery (https://aveaf.itch.io/) - Art

Nathan (https://countthrepe.itch.io/) - Code
